dcterms:creator: Concetto Spampinato
Simone Palazzo
Isaak Kavasidis
Daniela Giordano
Nasim Souly
Mubarak Shah
dcterms:description: The dataset consists of EEG-Image pairs for 40 classes, which is a subset of the ImageNet dataset. While recording the brain activity EEG signals, participants were shown 50 images from each class for 0.5 seconds. The EEG device consists of 128 channels, and after preprocessing, the length of each EEG signal becomes 440 timesteps. Approximately 11800 EEG-Image pairs are there in the final dataset after discarding the bad samples.
dcterms:title: EEGCVPR40

dcterms:creator: Pradeep Kumar
Rajkumar Saini
Partha Pratim Roy
Pawan Kumar Sahu
Debi Prosad Dogra
dcterms:description: This is a small-scale dataset curated by Kumar et al. It consists of 10 different object classes, which is a subset of the ImageNet. To collect the dataset, each participant was asked to visualize one of these 10 different classes. The EEG device is of 14 channels, and a total of 23 participants’ brain activity was recorded. After pre-processing, each EEG signal becomes 32 timesteps.
dcterms:title: ThoughtViz

dcterms:creator: Blair Kaneshiro
Marcos Perreau Guimaraes
Hyung-Suk Kim
Anthony M Norcia
Patrick Suppes
dcterms:description: The dataset consists of 6 classes, each with 12 images that are shown to 10 participants, and EEG signals are recorded using a 128 channel device. The 6 classes include a human body, human face, animal body, animal face, fruit vegetable, and an inanimate object. After pre-processing, the final EEG data is of size 124 × 32.
dcterms:title: Object
